function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High allergenicity of ornamental plant pollen","Impact":"Increased pollen allergy symptoms in local residents","Mitigation":"Planting low-allergenicity plant species, improving ventilation and air currents","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, urban landscaping techniques","People":"Local residents","Owner":"Urban planners, city officials"},{"Description":"Overabundance of specific plant species in urban vegetation","Impact":"Concentration of allergenic pollen in the air","Mitigation":"Introducing a greater variety of plant species, reducing the use of high-allergenicity plants","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring, diversity-oriented landscaping","People":"Local residents","Owner":"Botanists, urban planners"},{"Description":"Limited dispersion of pollen due to road-side tree planting","Impact":"Increased pollen concentration around roadsides, affecting the local micro-environment","Mitigation":"Spacing out tree planting, improving ventilation around roads","Technologies":"Urban planning techniques, air quality monitoring","People":"Local residents, commuters","Owner":"City officials, transportation authorities"}]}
